name: Valkey LXC
description: Valkey is an open source (BSD) high-performance key/value datastore that supports a variety of workloads.
script:
#!/bin/bash
# install Valkey LXC
wget https://example.com/valkey-lxc.sh -O valkey-lxc.sh
bash valkey-lxc.sh

name: Qdrant LXC
description: Qdrant is a vector search engine and vector database for high-dimensional vectors.
script:
#!/bin/bash
# install Qdrant LXC
wget https://example.com/qdrant-lxc.sh -O qdrant-lxc.sh
bash qdrant-lxc.sh

name: OPNsense VM
description: OPNsense is an open-source firewall and routing platform based on FreeBSD.
script:
#!/bin/bash
# install OPNsense VM
wget https://example.com/opnsense-vm.sh -O opnsense-vm.sh
bash opnsense-vm.sh

name: Home Assistant Container
description: Home Assistant is open source home automation that puts local control and privacy first.
script:
#!/bin/bash
# install Home Assistant Container
wget https://example.com/home-assistant-container.sh -O home-assistant-container.sh
bash home-assistant-container.sh

name: PVE Post Install
description: Post installation configuration for Proxmox Virtual Environment (PVE) to optimize and secure your system.
script:
#!/bin/bash
# PVE Post Install Configuration
wget https://example.com/pve-post-install.sh -O pve-post-install.sh
bash pve-post-install.sh

name: Docker LXC
description: Docker is an open-source project for automating the deployment of applications as containers.
script:
#!/bin/bash
# install Docker LXC
wget https://example.com/docker-lxc.sh -O docker-lxc.sh
bash docker-lxc.sh

name: Line Type Tool
description: The Line Type Tool, can be use to to import at one time SvN's standard line type to an existing project. When used, it will audit the line types in the model, import all the missing types and replace the existing ones, matching SvN's standards names. For individual/one-off new line type, use regular Revit processes.
script:
Manage > Additional Settings > Line Styles

![Line Type Tool](./images/line-type-tool.png)
